title: Scaffold JavaScript Boilerplate
description: Initialize a new JavaScript project with Express, Mongoose, Nodemon, and Dotenv
prompt: Set up a new JavaScript project with Express, Mongoose, Nodemon, and Dotenv. Fetch the latest package versions, generate a README with those versions, and initialize Git
example:
This will:
- Initialize npm project
- Install Express, Mongoose, Nodemon, Dotenv
- Create basic server structure
- Generate README with versions
- Initialize Git repository
author: GooseAI Team

project_path.description: Path where to create the project
